name: export-notes-software
short_description: Before purchasing a new utility there is always a fear in the mind of the user that whether it will meet his requirements or not. But with the availability of the free demo of NSF to PST conversion software, the user can easily weigh the potential of the tool and can take the decision of purchasing it after getting completely convinced with its functionality. Though free tool is an exact replica of full version but has a small limitation that it allows converting only first 10 items of every folder.
summary: with the availability of the free demo of NSF to PST conversion softwa
